data.pricing_trends: Pricing for flights to Guatemala tends to be lower in late November before holiday peaks. Expect higher rates from mid-December until early January due to Christmas and New Year.
data.booking_windows: The best booking window is 2 to 3 months prior for winter travel, optimizing for lower rates.
data.competition: Competitors include Mexico and Belize, appealing to similar traveler demographics, but Guatemala offers unique cultural experiences.
data.demand: Guatemala is trending upward, especially among cultural tourists and adventure seekers.
